data.message: Hello i have a problem everytime i uplpoad video why is it always removed and fb didnt allow it and how can i make it as hd quality??

replies.message: Hi Nicz. Your videos may be getting removed because they contained copyrighted, third-party materials. If you are experiencing other issues with videos, there are some troubleshooting tips you can try. Learn more in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2huyWs9. We hope this helps. -Elizabeth
But actually its not copyrighted example of covering a dance it was just a background music
